goals.goal: Secure private platform for sharing daily love notes between partners
Security through encryption at rest and access control
Beautiful responsive UI with modern web technologies
Static website with no server-side requirements
Automated deployment with security for sensitive content

stack.files: JSZip for packaging notes and images

architecture.auth-layer: Client-side password protection; Token-based auth in localStorage; SHA-256 hashing; Validation via successful decryption
architecture.data-management: Encrypted ZIP with notes/images; Notes as JSON with text and optional image refs; Client-side encryption/decryption only; No build-time decryption
architecture.ui-components: Login form; Notes display with image support; Navigation between notes
architecture.build: Static site generation (SSG); No secrets during build; Export to static HTML/CSS/JS

rule.security: Never store unencrypted notes in repo; Strong password hashing (SHA-256); Client-only decryption; Source notes directory excluded from git

flow.user: Login → Decrypt notes client-side → Navigate between notes → Session persists 30 days
flow.data-update: Create notes locally → Run encrypt script → Commit encrypted data → GitHub Actions deploys

examples.user-flow: 1. User visits site → Login form shown 2. User enters correct password → Notes decrypted in browser 3. User navigates between date-based notes 4. Session persists for 30 days via localStorage token 5. User logs out → Session cleared
